text: Tara pichata yetiya te'om se'i santana prasara karaile, tetiya te'om kaâ€™le, â€˜he mora raba! Niscaya ma'i iyaka kan'yaraupe prasara karaicho. Te'om yi prasara karaiche se'i samparke allaha samyaka aragata; arau putra santana kan'ya santanara darae nahaya; arau ma'i iyara nama raakhicho mara'iyama lagate abhisapta cayatanara paraa te'omka arau te'omra santanaka tomara asrayata dicho
